text: How should I credit the translation team in the commit message?

elements.text: How should I credit the translation team in the commit message?

root.text: <@U027JEHGZRA> was planning to create an update based on the weblate for <@U01JACR6L7L> to submit to the svn repo, but the holiday season may have delayed this. Any updates Gergely/Michael?
